label: DirectPosition
comment: A specified physical location described within a coordinate reference system.

datatypeProperties.comment: An ordered list of axis labels, expressed as text, for this specified direct position list.
A coordinate reference dimension, expressed as text, for this specified direct position list.
A count for this specified direct position list.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
An ordered list of Unit Of Measure (UOM) labels, expressed as text, for this specified direct position list.

referencedBy.comment: The specified direct position of a coordinate for this linear ring.
